item.description: Join Anne Deidre for a FREE Intro to her workshop "Your Intuitive Life Makeover." Find Your Blueprint to Unlock Your Lifes Purpose, Define Your Passion and Create More Personal Freedom! Workshop topics include: ~ Discover ancient secrets to opening your powerful connection to the Divine Power within you ~ Clear your energy field to attract more of what you want as you heal the emotional wounds of your past ~ Opening your intuitive channels ~ Connect with your true purpose in life ~ Reignite your dreams, passion and purpose ~ Discover your unique talents, gifts and strengths ~ Cultivating your creative intuitive Self ~ Align with the law of attraction that magnetizes health, wealth and happiness

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Into to Your Intuitive Life Makeover w/ Anne Deidre
